thread.title: Why isn't Jay Z in any of Beyoncé’s pregnancy pictures?
thread.title_full: Why isn't Jay Z in any of Beyoncé’s pregnancy pictures?

author: Jessica Gibb
title: Why isn't Jay Z in any of Beyoncé’s pregnancy pictures?
text:
Why isn't Jay Z in any of Beyoncé’s pregnancy pictures? Expectant dad is noticeably absent from ALL the pictures so far Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
When Beyoncé announced her pregnancy yesterday she did so with a beautiful photo that’s now become the most liked Instagram post ever. 
Today, she followed up with a whole set of photos from the beautiful maternity photo shoot. 
But there is one thing that’s missing in all of the images of Beyoncé’s pregnancy so far – expectant dad Jay Z is nowhere to be seen. Read More Beyoncé poses on a car in her maternity photoshoot (Photo: Beyonce.com) Beyoncé shows off her baby bump (Photo: Beyonce.com) 
The mum to be is expecting twins with her husband of eight years. 
Even their five-year-old daughter Blue Ivy made an appearance in the shoot. 
She kisses her mum’s growing baby bump in one sweet shot and reclines next to her holding flowers in another. Read More Beyoncé stripped off for the shoot (Photo: Beyonce.com) Beyoncé even went under the water for the shoot (Photo: Beyonce.com) 
But the photos are clearly a Jay Z-free zone. 
Despite the photo snub, the couple put on a show of unity with their pregnancy announcement yesterday. 
“We would like to share our love and happiness,” Beyoncé posted on Instagram. Blue Ivy poses with her mum (Photo: Beyonce.com) Blue Ivy kisses her mum's bump (Photo: Beyonce.com) 
“We have been blessed two times over. 
“We are incredibly grateful that our family will be growing by two, and we thank you for your well wishes.” 
She signed the message off: “The Carters.” Beyoncé floats in the water (Photo: Beyonce.com) Beyoncé cradles her bump (Photo: Beyonce.com) 
The couple - who have remained defiantly strong despite rumours surrounding their marriage - tied the knot in 2008. 
The two new arrivals could already have a BFF set for life when they are welcomed to the world, after Bey's Destiny's Child bandmate Kelly Rowland revealed their kids are already great friends . 
Speaking to E! News, she said: "Yes, they are extremely close. It's the sweetest thing. 
"It's the greatest thing about friendship when you're able to grow up together and your children are able to grow up together and it's just years. Like us on Facebook
